Locale.Value:
We have made some improvements to the new version:
1. The Video Presentation has integrated with the VRoid Hub platform. After logging in and authorizing, you can find more avatars on the VRoid Hub and apply them in DemoCreator.
2. Added two new avatars.
3. DemoCreator Spark's new update, which separated the screen recording and screenshot functions. And optimized the drawing tool and the user guide.
4. Fixed some bugs.
